741420.name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Death on the Reik
741420.description:
“I’ve been robbed! Can’t trust anyone around here”

The unthinkable has happened! One of the Inn Keeper’s men has stolen some of his dangerous books and run off, with the Skaven in hot pursuit. It’s up to our heroes to find and burn the threatening articles before they fall into enemy hands.

Pursue the thief through the Reikwald Forest, fighting off the Skaven that are in hot pursuit of him. Then proceed along the The River Reik as you attempt to catch up to the barge Dawnrunner, capture the thief and destroy the books before it’s too late.

In this DLC you will also get the Ceremonial Dagger for Sienna Fuegonasus, a fiery blade that allows her to ignite her foes with.

KEY FEATURES



Reikwald Forest: Someone has stolen dangerous books from the Inn Keeper, and the heroes must chase the culprit through the dark and mysterious Reikwald Forest, where dangers loom behind every tree and bush


The River Reik: The pursuit for the culprit continues along into the calm waters of The River Reik, as our heroes try to catch up to the thief who is trying to get away on the barge Dawnrunner


Ceremonial Dagger: Sienna Fuegonasus yearns to wield her new Ceremonial Dagger, which is capable of setting her enemies on fire. This weapon can only drop on levels included in the Death on the Reik DLC


4 New Achievements: Time to challenge yourself with 4 new achievements
741420.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 意大利语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
